title: Android 13 may introduce bedtime dark mode scheduling
content:
Android 13 is coming soon, and the most recent developer preview has already revealed more of what Google has in store for us. There are new PC features, updated media controls, and a whole lot more that’s going on under the hood as well. Now we’re getting a sneak peek at what could be an

The post Android 13 may introduce bedtime dark mode scheduling appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Android 13 may introduce the ability to schedule dark mode based on your Digital Wellbeing bedtime. Read about what that means here!
